text: Mersin İdmanyurdu (also Mersin İdman Yurdu, Mersin İY, or MİY) Sports Club; located in Mersin, east Mediterranean coast of Turkey in 1961–62. Mersin İdmanyurdu (MİY) football team. ==Information on previous seasons== * 1951: Mersin İdmanyurdu participated in "Türkiye Futbol Birincilikleri" (Turkey Football Championships) and took place in İçel Group with Adana Demirspor, Adana İdmanyurdu and Karagücü. Games were played on 12–17 May 1951. Group leaders participated in finals in Balıkesir starting from 24 May 1951.Milliyet arşivi - retrieved on 15.07.2010 * 1953: Mersin İdmanyurdu participated in "Türkiye Futbol Birincilikleri" (Turkey Football Championships). MİY became the leader of Mersin Group. Finals were played in Adana and Mersin on 17, 18 and 20 May 1953.Milliyet arşivi - retrieved on 15.07.2010 On 15 May, MİY played against Bursa Merinosspor in Adana. In other leg Havagücü and Göztepe played. The winner of the Adana group played the winner of the Mersin group.Milliyet arşivi - retrieved on 15.07.2010 * 28 Nov 1954 - Mersin İdmanyurdu-Mersinspor: 0-0. Mersin League game.Milliyet arşivi - retrieved on 15.07.2010 * 19 Oct 1958 - Mersin İdmanyurdu-Tarsus Yıldırımspor: 1-0. Mersin League game."Short news". Kısa haberler. Milliyet gazete arşivi, 20.10.1958, p. 6. Retrieved on 15.07.2010 * 24.02.1960 - Army team's preparation game: Army team- MİY: 4-0. Mersin. Army team: Sabih, Abdullah, Şehmuz, Ali (Tuncay), Süreyya, Mustafa Çam, Turhan, Can (Rıza), K.Ahmet, Hüseyin, Aydın. Goals: Turhan, K.Ahmet (first half), Aydın, Hüseyin."Army team defeated Mersin İ. Yurdu: 4-0". Ordu takımı Mersin İ. Yurdu'na 4-0 galip. Milliyet gazete arşivi, 25.02.1960, p. 8. Retrieved on 28.10.2010. * 9 Jun 1960 - MİY played "Türkiye Futbol Birincilikleri" (Turkey Football Championships) group matches with Havagücü.Milliyet arşivi - retrieved on 15.07.2010 The next day, on 11 May, Muhafızgücü beat MİY 1-0. 12 May Urfa Gençlikspor-Mersin İdmanyurdu: 2-1. * 5 Mar 1961 - Çukurova İdmanyurdu-Konya İdmanyurdu: 4-0.Toprakspor and Çukurova İdmanyurdu won Toprakspor ve Çukurova İdmanyurdu Galip Milliyet gazete arşivi 06.03.1961 - retrieved on 02.08.2010 * 28.02.1961 - ÇİY- Konya İdmanyurdu: - Previous games: ÇİY-KİY: 2-4. ÇİY-Konya G.Bir: 2-0. ÇİY-Nevşehir L.S.: 4-0. ÇİY-Nevşehir Gü.: 4-0. ÇİY: Ad. D. spor: 1-3. ==1961–62 season== ===Preparation games=== * 24 Feb 1962 - Army Team beat MİY 4-0 in a preparation game in Mersin. ===Regional amateur league participation=== Mersin League games (12.12.1961) and regional games (24.04.1962): ÇİY-Demirspor: 1-1. ÇİY-İçelspor:0-0. ÇİY-Yolspor: 3-1. ÇİY-Berzanspor: 4-0. ÇİY-Türkocağı: 3-1. ÇİY-Tarsus İdmanyurdu: 4-1. ÇİY-İtilspor: 2-1. ÇİY-Meriçspor: 1-1. ÇİY- Demirspor: 3-1. ÇİY-Demirspor: 3-0. ÇİY-Adana Kocavezir: ===Amateur football championship group stage=== 1962 - MİY played "Türkiye Futbol Birincilikleri" (Turkey Football Championships) group matches. * On the first day (01.06.1962) ÇİY-Urfa Tektekspor: 5-0. * In Mersin on the second day (2 June) Çukurova İdmanyurdu-Sivas Karagücü: 1-0.Group Champs Show up Today - Grup Şampiyonları Bugün Belli Oluyor Milliyet gazete arşivi, 03.06.1962 - retrieved on 15.07.2010. * On the last day (3 June), Çukurova İdmanyurdu-Diclespor: 1-1. Çukurova İdmanyurdu became leader of the Mersin group and became eligible to play finals in Balıkesir.Fight in Groups Ends - Gruplarda Mücadele Sona Erdi Milliyet gazete arşivi, 04.06.1962 - retrieved on 02.08.2010. ===Amateur football championship finals=== Finals started on June 8. After the final games İzmir Karagücü became the champions. Eskişehir Şekerspor were runners- up. ÇİY took the third place."İzmir Karagücü Champions". İzmir Karagücü Şampiyon. Milliyet gazete arşivi, 11.06.1962. Referee: Muvahhit Afir. Trabzon İdmanocağı: Ergin, Haydar, Erdoğan, Suat, Kenan, Osman, Cemalettin, Zekai, Nevzat, Faruk, Abdurrahman. Goal: Suat 78'. ÇİY: Doğan, Nevzat, Yahya, Emin, Ahmet, Oktay, Erol, Selahattini Teoman, Muammer, Hüseyin."Eskişehir Şekerspor: 1 İzmir Karagücü: 1". Eskişehir Şekerspor: 1 İzmir Karagücü: 1. Milliyet gazete arşivi, 10.06.1962, p. 7. Retrieved on 06.11.2010. Retrieved on 16.07.2010. Midfield player Selahattin was capped in the Amateur National Team for the 4th Mediterranean Games.National Amateur team come into the camp. Amatör Milliler kampa alındı. Milliyet gazete arşivi, 07.09.1963.
